total_revenue.fx_impact: Revenue would have been approximately $574 million higher at constant FX rates

drivers: Growth from Instagram Stories, Instagram Feed, and Facebook News Feed

payments_and_other_fees.context: Growth driven by sales of Oculus Quest and Rift S

asia_pacific.context: Tied with North America for strongest regional growth

europe.context: Slower growth partly due to currency impacts

key_factors: Increased investments in compliance, privacy, and product development

expense_growth_excluding_accrual.note: Without the $5 billion FTC settlement expense

core_investments.trend: Continued strong investment levels to meet regulatory requirements and improve product offerings

headcount.context: Investments in safety, product innovation, infrastructure, and compliance

operating_income.context: Operating margin would have been approximately 39% without the $5 billion FTC accrual

net_income.context: Includes impacts from FTC settlement and IRS vs Altera case

eps.impact_of_accrual: EPS reduced by approximately $1.08 due to FTC settlement and IRS ruling

cash_flow.context: Generated from operating activities after capital expenditures

capital_expenditures.context: Investments to support growth and infrastructure needs

share_repurchase.context: Class A common stock repurchased in Q2 2019

facebook_dau.leading_markets: Growth led by India, Indonesia, Philippines

daily_active_people_across_apps.context: Average daily active users across Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Messenger

monthly_active_people_across_apps.context: Average monthly active users across Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Messenger

drivers: Increased impressions on Instagram Stories, Instagram Feed, and Facebook News Feed
Ongoing mix shift towards Stories ads and lower-monetizing geographies

principles: Reducing permanence of content to enhance privacy
Secure data storage outside high-risk jurisdictions
initiatives: Settlement with FTC requiring $5 billion fine
Establishment of a new privacy committee on the Board
Implementation of quarterly privacy compliance certifications
Appointment of Chief Privacy Officer for Product
Enhanced monitoring of developers accessing platform data
business_impact_assessment: Encryption not expected to significantly impact ad targeting
Reduced permanence aligns with ad targeting methods relying on recent data
Risk from data localization if blocked in major markets
privacy_focused_vision.timeline: Comprehensive privacy program implementation ongoing, with new oversight structures in place

regulatory_positioning.goal: Increase trust through democratic processes, reduce reliance on unilateral private decisions
engagements: Meetings with European policymakers, including President Macron
Advocating for public processes led by democratically elected governments
Developing an independent oversight board for content decisions

stories_ads.adopters: Continuous growth with Instagram Stories, Facebook Stories
stories_ads.examples: Dunkin’ Donuts campaign with high engagement and lower cost per view

checkout_on_instagram.long_term_goal: Seamless commerce experience within the platform

marketplace_ads.success_story: Succulents Box generating 18% of total sales through Marketplace listings
marketplace_ads.expansion: Extended to more countries with positive early results

collaborative_ads.use_case: Brands without direct-to-consumer channels partnering with retailers
collaborative_ads.example: Samsung and Fravega in Argentina achieving 21% lift in sales

dynamic_ads.evolution: From initial rollout to tailored formats for different verticals and surfaces
dynamic_ads.examples: Frontier Airlines using Dynamic Ads to increase ad-related bookings and revenue

feed_ads.refresh_speed: Ads now refresh while scrolling, increasing relevance and engagement
feed_ads.benefits: Improved return on investment for advertisers

explore_ads.rollout: Started in Q2 2019 on Instagram Explore
explore_ads.benefits: Businesses can reach new audiences in discovery sections

branded_content_ads.features: Allowing businesses to promote Creators’ posts as feed ads
branded_content_ads.examples: Brands like Old Navy, Sephora, and Jack in the Box utilizing the feature

creator_product_tags.features: Creators can tag products in their posts for direct shopping
creator_product_tags.benefits: Easy shopping experience without leaving the app

ads_transparency.global_rollout: Made available globally for ads about social issues, elections, or politics
benefits: Enhanced defense against foreign interference and abuse

measures: Operation centers established for rapid response
Collaboration with third parties and fact-checking organizations
Expanded Ads Library to include all ads
ID and location verification for EU political/issue ads
'Paid for by' disclosures required in political ads
outcomes: Clean elections in EU attributed to Facebook’s efforts
Positive feedback from EU Parliament officials
election_integrity.future_plans: Continued efforts to protect upcoming 2020 U.S. elections

changes: No targeting by age, gender, or zip code
Creation of a new library for housing ads with reporting capabilities
examples: Improved ad targeting to prevent discrimination
Enhanced tools for reporting discriminatory ads

revenue_growth.expectation: Sequential deceleration of growth rates throughout 2019
revenue_growth.specifics: More pronounced deceleration expected in Q4 and into 2020

drivers: $5 billion FTC settlement expense (~16 percentage points of growth)
Ongoing investments in compliance, privacy, product development, and infrastructure

expense_outlook_excluding_accrual.note: Expense outlook essentially unchanged from last quarter excluding the $2 billion accrual recorded in Q2

capital_expenditures_guidance.reason_for_adjustment: Optimizing capital expenditures based on current investment needs

context: Tax treatment of FTC settlement accrual
IRS vs Altera case ruling affecting share-based compensation expenses

operating_environment_challenges: Regulatory scrutiny due to FTC settlement
Currency headwinds impacting European and Rest of World regions
Balancing privacy enhancements with monetization strategies
Maintaining user trust amidst evolving social and political scrutiny
